EmailTemplate.description: Response for March 2012 UK IB product webinar
EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Response - Mar12 UK IB Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: IntApp Webinar Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName}:
Thank you for registering for the IntApp Integration Builder Webinar. The login details are below.
Title: Improve Your Data Quality Date: Thursday, March 8 Time: 3pm GMT
Video:
Conference URL: http://www.infiniteconferencing.com/Events/intapp/ Participant Code: 75701795
Audio:
Conference Audio Dial In: UK: 00 800 4747 4646 US/Canada: (888) 567-1603 (You will not need to give the operator a passcode, just the title of the webinar)
